channel.title: How do i allow alt codes?
channel.description: since the laughing man bots log in with a british dollor thing sign, i want to know how i can allow it so you can type in alt codes on the server. that way i can ban and ipban the spammer right when he logs in

item.title: How do i allow alt codes?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

The bot isn’t actually typing an alt code into the server, he is sending the actual character (£) in a message through his client.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i allow alt codes?

item.title: How do i allow alt codes?
item.dc:creator: @Pheega Pheega
item.description:
@Pheega wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:281700”][quote author=Pheega link=topic=372149.msg2809464#msg2809464 date=1243905323]

He uses different IP’s everytime; therefore that would not be your solution. I recommend blocking the british dollar sign so that you can’t log in with it.
[/quote]Since when does an IP have anything to do with the characters in a username?

Well if you read the post above that one you might have seen why he said that…[/quote]I didn’t say anything about IP banning.
Maybe try connection throttling, lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i allow alt codes?
